title: Can the next marksman we get use throwing weapons instead of a gun/bow?
body:
So far we only have three marksmen that throw stuff at people. Draven, Sivir, and Kalista. Would love to see another champion that just throws stuff like knives as a basic attack. 

Just a thought is all.

replies.body: I want to see an adc that uses magic hand blasts instead of a weapon but it could be mistaken as a mage design wise
Well do i have great news for you. let me introduce you to {{champion:81}} .
He is using a magic bow though, i mean something like karma autos.
he uses a talisman the size of his arm. it takes a bow shape during his ult but for his auto's it pretty much enhances his innate magic power.
Oh {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} well since he's the only one another wouldn't hurt. There are 6 bows and 7 guns.
{{champion:6}} I have a MAGIC HAND BLAST!! PEW PEW PEW  {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
{{champion:96}}  Puke blast
We don't have a bot lane marksman who uses a blow gun, or one who uses an exteme long range weapon like a whip. I'd personally pee my pants in excitement if we got a ranged ADC who uses a whip.

Are you forgetting Teemo and Thresh?
Top tier ADC
I've always been sad that our only likely "whip" champion is one who barely has a use for it.

{{champion:17}} ???

fu

>
> Teemo is a top laner though.

not if you play him bot.
or anything but bot
Have him hit with a really big stick. A stick with a range of 550 or more.
His attacks damage all things in between him and his target for a passive!
Don't forget the %hp damage

On his 4th hit he gets a huge AD steroid and lifesteal bonus.

:thinking:
That also does true damage.
And slows for 3 seconds
and knocks enemies up if you have killed a minion within the last 5 seconds
And heals for 30% health and then grants a 50% maximum mana shield on top of that
And can't forget the invincibility frames.
But every time they say one, it's replaced with an entire episode of Breaking Bad.
ADC {{champion:62}}  new meta?
You said it, not me :^)
Rework Wukong

I would like to see a champion with ridiculously long arms. He would slap any foes within 550 range who oppose him. He would have short legs, so that would mean slow 325 MS. But it would be all good, since his E allows him to travel quickly using his arms, massively increasing MS, but reducing his range to 125, which is the reach of his stubby legs.
Did you mean Zac?

Rocks. They throw rocks.

Release skin is they are replaced by snowballs...with rocks in them.
AD {{champion:163}}?
We don't have a grenade or rocket launcher, but that'd be pretty similar to Ziggs/Tristana.

Erm, rocket launcher?

Er, that's a debatable point. lol.

no its not... have you seen her bite her lip man ?

SHE BITES HER LIP

Like how Graves revolves around his shotgun.
a sling champion that has insane stats but his passive is that his auto attacks have a 50% chance to hit a different nearby enemy.

he used to
Shhh we don't talk about those dark times.
Smite has Xblanque and I'd love to see something like that! I dunno how much another bola-throwing champion overlaps with {{champion:107}} though...
I really want another void monster. Last one was Reksai.
The next void creature definitely should be a support, not an adc.
We're due for a ranged void champ.  Look at the patterns of the release of previous Void champs.  Melee, ranged, melee, ranged, melee.  Also, the greatest gap between them was 10 new champions.
